dmca.title: Internet Shopping Site learns the ABC's of the DMCA
dmca.body:
[Private], BigLion.com 
[Private]
Smithtown, NY 11787 
April 19, 2005

Google, Inc.
Attn: [Private]
Fax: [Private]

Dear Google,
Please remove the infringing content of http://www.abczz.com and remove any penalties my site http://www.biglion.com may have received because of the infringement.

The copyrighted work at issue is the entire website located at http://www.biglion.com and all its internal pages.

Search Query. abczz
Infringing Web Pages: The entire website at http://www.abczzcom including all its internal pages are a direct copy of my website.

My Contact Information: [Private]

4.	Infringer's Contact Information: (Taken from the Whois of abczz.com) 
[Private]
[Private]
[Private]
Juno Beach, FL 33408
Tel: [Private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Sincerely,
[Private]
BigLion
Phone: [Private]
Email: [Private]
